snippet: Andy Murray will lead the British team in next week's Davis Cup quarterfinal against Serbia, which will be without No. 1-ranked Novak Djokovic....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray will lead the British team in next week's Davis Cup quarterfinal against Serbia, which will be without No. 1-ranked Novak Djokovic.

headline.print_headline: Murray to Play for Britain in Davis Cup Quarters vs Serbia
headline.main: Murray to Play for Britain in Davis Cup Quarters vs Serbia
